data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

Thank you Sir. Chris C. Ibe #AYCRIB for the information and recommendation to the World Federation Against Drugs, WFAD body as Member. Being here does feel like home to me as a trained volunteer, early childhood education activist, law person and youth ambassador. It is all of our collective responsibility to fight for a drug-free world, and we must all work together to ensure that the legal and social rights of users' are never violated. Thank you WFAD for the honor and I also look forward to an engaging collaboration with everyone. Warm regards. #WFAD
